Posts.EditableText:
I uploaded the game, so you should be able to download it now.

The Who Wants to Be A Millionaire part works now.  The game will eventually be casino like thing.  All of my objectives for it are listed in the manual or help file for the game.  I already have an updated version...  But it adds virtually nothing.

Please, please, please check out the game.

I will post here again when the game is approved.

Have fun!!!
